ostream& operator<< (  ostream &  os,
const H &  h
)  [inline]
 

Write a quaternion to an output stream.

The quaternion is written in the format (a,b,c,d).

Parameters:
os the output stream
h the quaternion we want to write

Quaternions in C++. From the CD-ROM accompanying C++ for Mathematicians.
